text: Johnnie Lucille Collier (April 12, 1923 â€“ January 22, 2004), also known as Ann Miller was an American dancer, singer and actress. She played Julie Shelton in the movie Melody Ranch. She played Lois in Kiss Me Kate. Miller was born in Chireno, Texas. She died at age 80 of lung cancer in Los Angeles, California. title: Ann Miller
